context.name: Hawke Airmax 30 SF 4-16x50 AMX IR Rifle Scope
context.excerpt: The Hawke Airmax 30 SF 4-16×50 AMX IR Rifle Scope, designed especially for air rifle use, featuring the new AMX reticle and side-wheel parallax adjustment.
context.content:
The Hawke Airmax 30 SF 4-16x50 AMX IR Rifle Scope, designed especially for air rifle use, featuring the new AMX reticle and side-wheel parallax adjustment.

Hawke Airmax 30 SF 4-16x50 AMX IR Rifle Scope Features:

16 layer fully multi-coated optics for exceptional clarity
Side focus control for parallax adjustment to infinity
30mm mono-tube chassis for superior strength
Glass etched reticle with red illumination
Stepless rheostat offers total brightness control
Â¼ MOA exposed, locking and resettable turrets
Fast focus eyebell and high torque zoom ring
